text: The old paths of succession must be maintained, lest the clans crumble and disperse.

You all are the descendants of Tanshihuai, each brings their own strength.
[[b]]Ancestral Legacy[[/b]] can be increased by faction leader, heir positions, and certain characters
[[b]]Ancestral Legacy[[/b]] is used to recruit, banish, and release characters from court positions or from faction.
